title: PulaTech
description: Implementation and design of WordPress-based marketing site for PulaTech. Work done as a member of the PulaTech team.

title: Cambria DragonVision
description: Cambria's DragonVision Suite allows consumers to visualize Cambria Quartz Surfaces in kitchen spaces. Development done in AngularJS as a member of the Cambria team. Available online today.

title: Cambria Design Palette
description: The Cambria Design Palette brings simple, at-a-glance visuals of Cambria Quartz Services to consumers. Development done in AngularJS as a member of the Cambria team. Available online today.

title: Davis Family Dairies
description: Davis Family Dairies marketing site implementation and mentorship over junior engineers working on this replatforming project. Development done in AngularJS and Wordpress as a member of the Cambria team. Available online today.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: Personal project to demonstrate use of React environment.

title: Best Buy Total Tech Support and Geeksquad Services
description: Created scheduling portals for in-home and in-store repairs, tools for customers to find customer support for their purchases, and self-service payment interfaces for Geek Squad and Best Buy Total Tech Support.

title: Best Buy Live Chat
